metadata.name: Blush #1/100
metadata.description:
Blush is the first token from this collection of females - a celebration of human characteristics and strengths.

The hint of dystopia to the background, references how our matriachs triumph against all odds, stand tall against threats and survive the often unsurvivable.

Each character within the collection is a personification of a characteristic or personality trait/s.

The women emerge from a floral base with a gentle colour palette to emphasize their warrior presence, the strength and the gentle, the ferocity and the compassion.

Ready for battle, these women stand mighty, a representation of the women we all identify with or look up to; the leaders, matriarchs, mothers and friends who carry us, literally.
